Episodes.description: When Mel Gibson becomes convinced that Homer is the only man with the guts to tell him the truth, he insists Homer accompany him to Hollywood to help fix his newest film project, a remake of Mr. Smith Goes to Washington.
Episodes.title: Beyond Blunderdome

Episodes.description: Bart is put on medication to control his behavior, but the pills cause him to become paranoid and insane.
Episodes.title: Brother's Little Helper

Episodes.description: Homer's negative reviews as a food critic puts his life in danger. Fortunately he has Lisa fighting for him.
Episodes.title: Guess Who's Coming to Criticize Dinner?

Episodes.description: The Simpsons attempt to cover up their accidental murder of Ned Flanders in "I Know What You Did-Iddly-Did." Then, Bart and Lisa become superheroes and save Lucy Lawless from the evil Collector in "Desperately Xeeking Xena." Finally, Homer's incompetence causes a Y2K apocalypse in "Life's A Glitch, Then You Die."
Episodes.title: Treehouse of Horror X

Episodes.description: Homer cowards out of a pistol-duel and hides out with the rest of the family on a country farm.
Episodes.title: E-I-E-I-D'oh"

Episodes.description: Homer becomes a minor celebrity around Springfield after bowling a perfect game.
Episodes.title: Hello Gutter, Hello Fadder

Episodes.description: Apu struggles with fatherhood after Manjula gives birth to octuplets.
Episodes.title: Eight Misbehavin'

Episodes.description: Homer's attempt at creating a motorcycle gang attracts a real gang, who kidnap Marge.
Episodes.title: Take My Wife, Sleaze

Episodes.description: A toy company purchases Springfield Elementary and uses the student body as a focus group for their new Christmas toy Funzo.
Episodes.title: Grift of the Magi

Episodes.description: Lisa finds out how rough Marge has it when her mom is in traction and she becomes the woman of the house. Homer and Bart's antics get her so worked up she conspires to teach them a lesson.
Episodes.title: Little Big Mom

Episodes.description: Bart is led to believe he has special healing powers after a tent revival.
Episodes.title: Faith Off

Episodes.description: When Mr. Burns has to go the Mayo Clinic in Minnesota for a checkup, he chooses The Simpsons to take care of his mansion while he is gone. Homer and his friends take Mr. Burns yacht into international waters, where they end up being targeted by modern day pirates.
Episodes.title: The Mansion Family

Episodes.description: The Simpsons get an abused horse and make him a contender in horse racing. Homer finds out a secret conspiracy about jockeys. Lisa tries to reach President Clinton when the results of a school band talent competition seem tainted.
Episodes.title: Saddlesore Galactica

Episodes.description: Ned deals with his grief after Maude's untimely death.
Episodes.title: Alone Again, Natura-Diddily

Episodes.description: When Homer is wanted dead for reneging on a 10,000 dollar pledge to PBS, Reverend Lovejoy sets him up for missionary work in the South Pacific until the heat dies down.
Episodes.title: Missionary: Impossible

Episodes.description: Plastic surgery not only transforms Moe the Bartender from ugly to hunky, it helps gets him a job on a hit daytime drama.
Episodes.title: Pygmoelian

Episodes.description: Bart gets a glimpse of the future while the family is on vacation at an Indian casino.
Episodes.title: Bart to the Future

Episodes.description: Homer doesn't like it when Barney quits drinking; Bart and Lisa get into trouble when they enter a photo contest for the new phone book cover.
Episodes.title: Days of Wine and D'oh'ses

Episodes.description: The Simpsons become wanted criminals after injuring a famous alligator during a Florida vacation.
Episodes.title: Kill the Alligator and Run

Episodes.description: Lisa has difficulties learning to tap dance. Meanwhile Bart and Milhouse ditch summer camp to spend a week living in the mall.
Episodes.title: Last Tap Dance in Springfield

Episodes.description: Everybody loves the new Simpsons' house guest Becky. Except Marge, who thinks Becky wants to kill her.
Episodes.title: It's a Mad, Mad, Mad, Mad Marge

Episodes.description: The Simpsons discuss their fame in a behind the scenes look at the show.
Episodes.title: Behind the Laughter
